holidays.name: National Puppy Day
holidays.description: A playful day dedicated to celebrating the unconditional love and joy puppies bring into our lives. People share pictures, adopt puppies, and spread puppy love!
holidays.origin: Founded in 2006 by animal advocate Colleen Paige to promote adoption of puppies from shelters or rescues.
holidays.funFact: Each year, thousands of puppies are adopted worldwide on this day, changing lives one wagging tail at a time!
